
   // degree =  2   => absolute accuracy is  2 bits
#if ( DEGREE == 2 )
   float p =  -0.5 + x * (8.067174255847930908203125e-2 + x * 1.008447170257568359375) ;
#endif
   // degree =  3   => absolute accuracy is  4 bits
#if ( DEGREE == 3 )
   float p =  -0.25 + x * (-0.50134980678558349609375 + x * (1.3293564319610595703125 + x * (-4.8974819481372833251953125e-2))) ;
#endif
   // degree =  4   => absolute accuracy is  5 bits
#if ( DEGREE == 4 )
   float p =  -0.25 + x * (-0.6741712093353271484375 + x * (1.6245143413543701171875 + x * (-0.185323536396026611328125 + x * 1.8566586077213287353515625e-2))) ;
#endif
   // degree =  5   => absolute accuracy is  6 bits
#if ( DEGREE == 5 )
   float p =  -0.125 + x * (-1.310075283050537109375 + x * (2.570405483245849609375 + x * (-0.75883638858795166015625 + x * (0.1694496572017669677734375 + x * (-1.4316715300083160400390625e-2))))) ;
#endif
   // degree =  6   => absolute accuracy is  7 bits
#if ( DEGREE == 6 )
   float p =  -0.125 + x * (-1.423507213592529296875 + x * (3.011091709136962890625 + x * (-1.2965412139892578125 + x * (0.45083200931549072265625 + x * (-8.0463469028472900390625e-2 + x * 5.745188333094120025634765625e-3))))) ;
#endif
   // degree =  7   => absolute accuracy is  9 bits
#if ( DEGREE == 7 )
   float p =  -0.125 + x * (-1.48320865631103515625 + x * (3.318569660186767578125 + x * (-1.8168985843658447265625 + x * (0.8517272472381591796875 + x * (-0.2355104386806488037109375 + x * (3.509019315242767333984375e-2 + x * (-2.16321647167205810546875e-3))))))) ;
#endif
   // degree =  8   => absolute accuracy is  9 bits
#if ( DEGREE == 8 )
   float p =  -0.125 + x * (-1.5087211132049560546875 + x * (3.48326396942138671875 + x * (-2.18138217926025390625 + x * (1.234420299530029296875 + x * (-0.449914515018463134765625 + x * (0.1009194850921630859375 + x * (-1.261066831648349761962890625e-2 + x * 6.700190715491771697998046875e-4))))))) ;
